Voici ci-dessous l exemple de Wilson:
Voici votre matrice initialisee :
   x1                     x2              x3              x4              ╬╗
1 10.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 8.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 32.0000000000000000
2 7.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 6.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 23.0000000000000000
3 8.0000000000000000 6.0000000000000000 10.0000000000000000 9.0000000000000000 33.0000000000000000
4 7.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 9.0000000000000000 10.0000000000000000 31.0000000000000000

1e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              x4              ╬╗
1 7.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 6.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 23.0000000000000000
2 -0.0000000000000002 -0.1428571428571430 -0.5714285714285716 -0.1428571428571430 -0.8571428571428579
3 8.0000000000000000 6.0000000000000000 10.0000000000000000 9.0000000000000000 33.0000000000000000
4 7.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 9.0000000000000000 10.0000000000000000 31.0000000000000000

2e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              x4              ╬╗
1 7.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 6.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 23.0000000000000000
2 -0.0000000000000002 -0.1428571428571430 -0.5714285714285716 -0.1428571428571430 -0.8571428571428579
3 0.0000000000000004 0.2857142857142860 3.1428571428571432 3.2857142857142860 6.7142857142857153
4 7.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 9.0000000000000000 10.0000000000000000 31.0000000000000000

3e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              x4              ╬╗
1 7.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 6.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 23.0000000000000000
2 -0.0000000000000002 -0.1428571428571430 -0.5714285714285716 -0.1428571428571430 -0.8571428571428579
3 0.0000000000000004 0.2857142857142860 3.1428571428571432 3.2857142857142860 6.7142857142857153
4 0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 3.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 8.0000000000000000

4e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              x4              ╬╗
1 7.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 6.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 23.0000000000000000
2 -0.0000000000000002 -0.1428571428571430 -0.5714285714285716 -0.1428571428571430 -0.8571428571428579
3 0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 2.0000000000000000 3.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000
4 0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 3.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 8.0000000000000000

5e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              x4              ╬╗
1 7.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 6.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 23.0000000000000000
2 -0.0000000000000002 -0.1428571428571430 -0.5714285714285716 -0.1428571428571430 -0.8571428571428579
3 0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 2.0000000000000000 3.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000
4 0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 3.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 8.0000000000000000

6e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              x4              ╬╗
1 7.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 6.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 23.0000000000000000
2 -0.0000000000000002 -0.1428571428571430 -0.5714285714285716 -0.1428571428571430 -0.8571428571428579
3 0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 2.0000000000000000 3.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000
4 0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 0.5000000000000000 0.5000000000000000

Les reponses sont:
x1 = 0.9999999999999990 x2 = 1.0000000000000016 x3 = 1.0000000000000000 x4 = 1.0000000000000000

Les mineurs principaux sont:
m1 = 7.0000000000000000 m2 = -0.1428571428571430        m3 = 2.0000000000000000 m4 = 0.5000000000000000
